template.name: Thirdparty Checkout
template.description: Used to override checked out branch for external repositories

param.name: OVERRIDDEN_BRANCH
param.spec: text description='Overridden branch for external repositories' label='Branch' validationMode='not_empty' display='normal'

runner.name: Checkout target branch in remote repositories

parameters.param:
#!/usr/bin/env bash set -o nounset; set -o errexit; set -o pipefail; set -o errtrace; set -o functrace set -x
for repository in %REPOSITORY_LIST%; do cd ${repository} git fetch -p git checkout %OVERRIDDEN_BRANCH% cd .. done
